short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension connects to C-Pen Connect, and can be used for assistive text reading as well as general text capture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: C-Pen Connect companion software. This extension enables Chrome browser to connect to C-PEN Connect pen scanner and receive scanned text - and have it read out loud. Compatible with Chrome browser on MAC and Windows.
